title: 飞艇怎么用
author: 安子墨.
txt_content: 求解啊..飞艇MOD怎么用啊啊

replies.author: likeliang
replies.txt_content: AIRSHIP是飞船，SHIP是船，8前进2后退，4左转，6右转

replies.author: 安子墨.
replies.txt_content:
likeliang 发表于 2012-7-30 19:29 
AIRSHIP是飞船，SHIP是船，8前进2后退，4左转，6右转
怎么上升？

replies.author: likeliang
replies.txt_content:
安子墨. 发表于 2012-7-30 19:47 
怎么上升？
空格上升SHIFT下降

replies.author: likeliang
replies.txt_content:
安子墨. 发表于 2012-7-30 19:47 
怎么上升？
不对，是+上升，-下降
